mapper.select: select d.id, d.name, count(e.dep_id) as count from departments d left join employees e on d.id = e.dep_id group by d.id, d.name;

SELECT e.name, sum(a.work_hours) as work_hours FROM attendance a left join employees e on a.emp_id = e.emp_num WHERE work_date >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-01') AND work_date < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') group by e.name order by work_hours desc;
select COUNT(pos_id) as count, title from employees e left join positions p on e.pos_id = p.id group by pos_id;

select count(status), status, emp_id, e.name, d.name from attendance a left join employees e on a.emp_id = e.emp_num left join departments d on e.dep_id = d.id where status = '결근' and work_date = curdate() group by status, emp_id;
select count(*) as count from employees;
select count(*) as count from meeting_room_booking where Date (start) = curdate() and booking_status = 'confirmed';
select count(*) as count from supplies_booking where DAte(start) = curdate() and booking_status = 'confirmed';

select e.emp_num, e.name, e.last_login, d.name as departmentName, p.title as positionTitle from employees e left join departments d on e.dep_id = d.id left join positions p on e.pos_id = p.id where Date (last_login) = curDate() order by last_login;
